node.html: An analysis into the famous mathematical problem of the Collatz conjecture.
A Python verison of the game tic-tac-toe which can be played with 1 or 2 players or against the computer. This script was inspired from the film war games.
A python script for a version of the game of battleships, can be played with 1 or 2 players.
A Python data mining simulation into WEKA software analysis, using sklearn to analyse the mined data and plot the revised data.
